channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MS
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for MS

item.title: Report E-2024070676
item.description:
Report E-2024070676

item.title: Report X-2024072171
item.description:
Report X-2024072171

Identified by scraper @ 2024-07-30T12:20:58+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-07-23
  • City: OLIVE BRANCH
  • State: MS
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On July 23rd a package was brought to one of our stations. The Astra label was removed causing us to open the package looking for more information. This led us to discover the package contained UN3480 Lithium Ion Batteries, 9. There were no indications on the outside of the package that a battery was inside the package. The package is being held pending further disposition.
